document_data.name: Skykillers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Skykillers''' were a disbanded mercenary company based in [[Chondath]] around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History: They fought during the war against the [[arcanaloth]] [[Yrkhetep]] at the [[yugoloth]]'s side. They were destroyed by the [[Windriders]] at the [[Battle of Five Crowns]].
document_data.Leadership: Their leader, Sir [[Lehakin]], was a mortal enemy of [[Bren Wingblade]], leader of the Windriders.
